fields.name: train_car_id
fields.description: Identifies a train car or asset. If possible, this should match other internal agency asset IDs.

fields.name: model_name
fields.description: Describes the train car or asset's model.

fields.name: facility_name
fields.description: Name or internal agency ID for the facility where the train car or asset is generally held.

fields.name: capacity_seated
fields.description: Number of seats on the train car or asset.

fields.name: wheelchair_capacity
fields.description: Number of wheelchair spaces on the train car or asset.

fields.name: bike_capacity
fields.description: Number of bike spaces on the train car or asset.

fields.name: bike_rack
fields.description:
Indicates if the train car or asset has a usable bike rack. Valid options are:
0 - Asset has a usable bike rack.
1 - Asset does not have a usable bike rack.

fields.name: capacity_standing
fields.description: Standing capacity of the train car or asset set by the manufacturer.

fields.name: train_car_type
fields.description:
Indicates the type of train car or asset. Valid options are:
0 - Train car.
1 - Trolley.
2 - Other.

name: train_cars.schema.json
description: Assets that comprise vehicles, such as train cars, with descriptive information.
